content: Twice installing and uninstalling. Error all the time, unable to register, let alone logging in. The first page where it says allobank, just keep on flipping white screen back and front. I uninstalled it,thinking it was probably a glitch. Downloaded it again only to run into the same problem. Had enough of it after attempting it twice though it said it was compatible with my phone. All other apps work just fine, this one though, na ah. Just wouldn't even pass the first page.

i hope you're working on it cause this app is awful. both, actually, your web and your app. there's bug everywhere. sometimes it even shows the strange code im sure i wasn't supposed to see. the experience is really unsatisfying. the amount of loading time is sooo bothering. at the website, there's a bug while i registered my phone number but when i refreshed it already registered. so confusing. please be better.

Very poor UI/UX. Took several times to scan ID card. Cannot log in when the server is full, I never experienced this problem in other digital banks. Took me a long time to get answered by Customer Service on the phone. I also experienced some top up problems. I couldn't top up my wallet using various banks and other fintechs. There were no solutions about these problems other than to "wait". I'd recommend other digital bank with proper service.

Can't not even register on my phone (samsung note 10) for days .. Already fill in all the necessary information and data/ but the data inputed always becomes red with the statement under it "ups we need this information" .. Even after restart my phone and reinstalling the apps multiple times, still having the same issue ~ useless and wasting times :)))))))))))

It is much easier to use my other reputable online bank apps. They should have fix this acute problem in the first place instead of asking to be contacted

Saya baru mengalami kejadian buruk dengan perusahaan ride hailing investor Bank Jago. Saya memutuskan koneksi pembayaran antara apk Jago dgn apk tsb untuk berjaga-jaga. Semoga dengan segera Jago bisa hadirkan fitur untuk exclude kantong ke dalam analisa pengeluaran.

Overall it's a good app, the interface has improved but can be buggy at times. This app is the real digital bank. It is easy to use, has a nice design, and it is really helpful for the millenials with its sharing feature. I'm giving four stars because there is still a room for improvement in the pocket feature. Unlike normal transfer where we can give description, unfortunately, this is not the case when we move our money from saving pockets to main pocket. It only has category options. It would be great if description is also added when we choose the category.

I like the user interface, it's simple and modern. But I found one issue about adding money from other pocket. When I added money from main pocket to saving pocket, the process was stuck. I checked the money was same as before. So I thought the process failed, then I tried it once again with the same amount of money, until I realized the process was done twice. Hope this problem will be fixed soon.

I wish there were a quick shortcut for QRIS transactions so that users wouldn't have to log in first to scan QRIS. Additionally, a feature to peek at specific or overall Jago pocket balance without having to authenticate with PIN or fingerprint first would be great.
UI/UX is stylish, customizable, and easy to understand, but it could be janky for older phones. The banking service side is pretty solid as well. Good bank üëçüëç

Wt...? After log in with my password, it's asking my PIN, but I've not created my PIN yet, so I logged in with my password. But then it still asks for my PIN. I have not created my PIN yet. How can I get to the "Create Pin page"? Somehow this "Create PIN page" has been skipped. I cannot get to it. Update: Cool app! Best part: link to GoPay. üëçüèº
The all features is working properly. Kudos for Jago teams, previously I have experienced can't create a wallet. And now, it resolved.

It is a great app in general, but i have a suggestion. When we generate the bank transfer proof/receipt, it would be nice if you censor several numbers of our bank account as the sender for privacy concerns. We usually share the receipts with other people, so i don't want my bank account credentials to be seen by others.

This is really good digital banking services and platform. Easy to use, easy to navigate. All my banking needs that I usually do from conventional bank is covered by this app. In addition, connection with various financial apps and wallets is a plus. Yet, I give short of 1 star from the perfect is because I experienced hiccups during first setup. I did refer to some of my friends, but all of them have difficulties during initial setup. I haven't refer the app to anyone since then.

Overall is good but need improvement. Every I clicked back button, its always close the app. Either in home section, wallet section, or other section. I think it's better when we click back button, it's going to before section, not close the app. Also for closing the app, pls add some confirmation, pop up message or 2x back button for confirmation.

Nice banking app, seamless and smooth! Easy to use & user friendly, love it! I have found 2 bugs: when moving money less than 50k or 100k from saving pocket to spending pocket there could be an error; when moving money, the button could be pressed twice accidently and there will be double transaction done.
It will be a great if you give option dark mode, because my eyes sensitive during the night.

A great debit card that acts like credit card! App is smooth but there are some minor problems I've experienced in the past few days: slow notification menu, bibit showed up in like 5 minutes after it said my registration's approved, app asked me for fingerprint/pin multiple times before finally getting in. Last one is I hope we can move gopay to jago real soon because I regularly juggling with these two amazing wallets and I believe I'm not the only one.

Almost a perfect banking app, The best replacement for Jenius, you can create different pockets for different purposes, such as shopping, saving, etc However, the payment features such as virtual account and payment for insurance, loans, etc are not available at the moment (May 2022), so would still be a good supplement to a big bank but cannot completely overtake BCA, Mandiri or BNI, Overall it's a solid secondary bank, I use it for everyday tasks, just not as a payment method for bills.

Love that QRIS is available now! Also, can you provide the feature to authorize the transaction using biometrics only like a fingerprint? This will be helpful in public areas where I don't need to cover my hand typing the pin when paying with QRIS. Please add this feature, Gopay, and other digital wallets are also offered the same and the experience is very seamlesssss as a customer I think. That would be a great addition to Jago Apps!!!

Good Digital Banking, Fast and Zero Fee transfer. Need improvement on performance, especially during busy hours, some time transaction failed and not updated. Most of my financial activities now migrated to Jago as the blue color one is complicated and to much fees. Transaction categories is good features combined with spending analysis. However, a little suggestion here is to allow user to add custom categories so it can match the real spending, and analysis will be more accurate. thanks.

Come on! What is happening to you Jago?? Can't open the app at all since last night! Even "send feedback" report is not working. Device Samsung A50s, app version 5.7.0(619). Please fix. This is fatal for a digital bank. Ok now is working after uninstalled then reinstalled. Changed to 4 stars for now. Will give 5 once seeing faster flow in the app.

So far still one of the best experience in digital banking. I only have one suggestion though (for now). As a person that tend to have everything organized, it would be better to have an action button "mark all read" for the push notif/notification menu üòÅ Thanks!

It's a good app but login are really slow sometimes. It also has multiple login options like fingerprint and facial recognition but it somehow detects both the fingerprint and the face and then it crashed. Everything else is fantastic though.

E-KYC, video call verification, and onboarding was very smooth! It took less than 2 mins after the call for my account (a.k.a Kantong) to be created! This is good, as I also tried other digital banks, I struggled a lot with the verification stuffs. Will wait for the debit card and many more exciting stuffs to come. Kudos!

Awesome app. Love it from day one. It's simple and easy to use‚Äîbut there's just one catch, and that catch is the lack of a "pay by QRIS" feature, a staple of many established competing digital banks. I hope you guys add a "pay by QRIS" feature soon! PS: Also add a dark mode please!

Almost a perfect banking app, The best replacement for Jenius, you can create different pockets for different purposes, such as shopping, saving, etc However, the payment features such as virtual account and payment for insurance, loans, etc are not available at the moment (May 2022), so would still be a good supplement to a big bank but cannot completely overtake BCA, Mandiri or BNI, Overall it's a solid secondary bank, I use it for everyday tasks, just not as a payment method for bills.

I've been using Bank Jago for a few months now and I'm really impressed with it. The app is super easy to use and has a lot of great features. of all the digital banks that I have tried, this bank jago is one of the digital banks that I think is good. Tapi sayang sekali, untuk penarikan tunai di ATM bank lain tetap kena biaya 7500. Seandainya gratis juga pasti keren. Mengingat bank ini gak punya ATM. Jadi kalo mau tarik tunai pasti harus pakai ATM Bank lain.

Support agent not helping. Giving silly question which I already explain before. The apps also very slow. Sometime I can't send the msg. I have to delete the message first, then rewrite it. Want to buy other currency, but the number automatically minus 0.01. Example buying JPY 500.. It's written automaticaly 499.99. No explanation why. And support can't answer that

The only reason I'm using this is for online debit transaction. Otherwise, I wouldn't use this awful app. The performance is frustratingly slow, the method to switch our accpunt to another phone is extremely annoying and time consuming, and most importantly, out of nowhere they take Rp10.000 out of your account. What's worse is that it accumulates. I'm thinking of finding an alternative for my needs.

Amazingly slow performance and always failed to activate my account. When it comes to be connected to video call, the apps was force closed at any time I tried. I followed the operator to try many times. Now, I refuse to try again. My phone works well with another banking apps even to make the same video call or stream HD video. If it is possible to rate 0 star, I'll do.

It might be great if only the app ACTUALLY works. Sadly, it's glitching quite often. I won't dare to put money in here anymore. As soon as the system is back online, I'm taking it out. I have to make an urgent transaction and I have to wait because the app is error. The app's purpose is to make transaction easier but it has failed to serve even the most basic purpose. I used to think of this as a great app, but now I can't even touch my money.

I give up on registering an account via this app. I did it twice but still failed. The call center sounds helpful but solving nothing at the end. I think the problem is not the stability of the Internet connection, but your app is too heavy. This makes the account verification difficult. I rarely leave a review on this Google play. This might be because I do want to use Jenius, but the experience itself is too bad.

The apps performance is really bad, super slow. It keeps on loading for more than 30 minutes. I often face difficulties to open the apps. Once it is opened, it only displays loading screen so that I can't use any feature. The flexi saver and dashboard is often show wrong balance such as 0. The bank charges Rp10k every month just for a service like this. The process for closing account is also uncomfortable. Please fix either the apps or the procedure to close account. Thank you.

Really love the app for it has great feature, it's been slow since I first install the app, BUT for these past 2-3 months, the app is getting SUPER SLOW. The app is being unreliable to handle emergency/daily need where we need fast service (this is why we use mbanking/ibanking instead of ATM or go to Bank Teller after all). I felt that the great feature was useless when it didn't functioned as expected. Plus something was wrong with the data, my Dream Saver is stucked on Processing state :(

I used to love this app so much, but since the last update the UI seems so heavy and slower. It's really bothering when you have to send money but stucked in the main page. Worse, this happened after the feesible thing taken every month. No, I did'nt paid monthly fee for a slower and ineffective app like this. We don't really need new UI, we want simple and dependable banking experience.

In theory, this app/product could be a great payment solution, especially for those who doesn't have access to online payment method. But, the system is hardly reliable, logging in to the apps take time, card verification failed. It's just not dependable. The CS team is super slow when it comes to handle complaints. And there is also some annoying UI that ask whether you're still want to chat while it's the CS that takes an awful long time to reply. Disappointing 1/5

Sorry I have to give this app 1 star review. So, recently I've moved the genius app to my new phone and suddenly I can't do log in?! I've been trying for so many times, but everything is the same, when I input the OTP numbers, it says "your session has expired. you are now logged out automatically" hell! Please do your job properly to fix this problem. And I refuse to go to the branch office, because this is a problem that you guys the developers can fix it. Thank you.

After the update I can't even login into my account, it asks me to scan my finger prints then ask me to input my pin over and over again but still cannot log in. At first I thought it was my internet connection but NO! I can play YouTube on 720p without problem and no buffering. And the WORSE is there's no button to connect me to call center or any help whatsoever! I never leave a bad Review before this but this is just too much! Please fix the God damn server FFS!

Been using this aplication for months now.. at fisrt this app is great. It's convenient and very easy to use. But nowadays many problems occur; such as it's hard to do transaction ( failed every now and then), the page isn't loaded completely, unable to login due to wrong pin number even though i didn't change the pin number and when i reset to new pin still unable to log in. It's really hard to use now...

I can't even begin to fathom on how bad the service is. First, they won't allow you to log back in to your account after resetting your phone or after getting your phone stolen for "security reasons". Not only that, the process to get your previous device unlisted is a nightmare, especially if you don't remember the specific details for your latest transaction with them. Not only that, they had the gall and audacity to charge 10,000 IDR/month for this kind of service. Y'all flopped!

Have been using this app for more than 3 years. Changed from 4 stars to 2 stars rating. I'm okay with the new monthly fees for the sake for better service, but sadly there is no improvement for the server, everything is really slow. I can't even transfer my money today. Edit: bring back previous UI, current UI looks good but I need to navigate to see transaction or see my savers. It's okay if the speed is fast, but too bad it's not. There is a quite long delay every time I press any button

It is highly not recommended to use this application, especially to open an account here, after the "BIG" update that changed the UI/UX appearance of the application, there were lots of bugs and lags during use. Not only that, the service for checking transactions also takes a very long time, especially during maintenance which requires us to wait a long time and there is no warning or notification beforehand if maintenance will be carried out. Not recommended !!

Do NOT ever open the account or even install this app. I tried to transfer my balance from this not-so-genius app to OVO, and all I got is there is the problem with my internet connection, while I can do other transactions. What kind of service is this?? This doesn't happen only once or twice, it happens almost EVERY TIME. It is so annoying, I usually a straight person, if your service is good, 5 stars there you are. But this time? Nah, I would give zero star if I can.

Wow my review just vanished. No problem I'll write it again! Be careful with this app! Lost my money from this app. It automatically transfer out my money without any command or setting from me. Surprisingly, the transfer history gone too (yes, first it appeared then gone few hours later). So it must be from someone who can access their system! Already called and chatted the customer care, but their chat service are getting worse everytime. Spent many calls and still no solution! Disappointing!

Very laggy. Very slow. And the customer service on twitter says that we need to clear data and cache if it lags. But as it lags everytime i need to use it, so i have to clear data first before hand. EVERY SINGLE TIME. It is so unreliable. Considering this app handles all private financial data of mine, i hope the developer will prioritize making the app faster and more reliable as well as secure.

I don't know why this is suddenly happening to me. I never have any problem with Jenius Application before, I know that it was always slow in responding when you try to open your app, but this thing happen to me now, never actually happen before. So, I really want you to help me. I couldn't sign in into my own account. Everytime I try to sign in then set my pin, it always said that my session is expired, so I logged out automatically. I already try to uninstall the app but it didn't work either.

Very unstable and really slow loading time. Suddenly can't log in due to unknown reason for almost 6 hours straight. The most unbelievable thing is it's already happen MANY time. It seems they don't even try to fix this issue. It's hella annoying when you really need to transfer/do something about your money, yet you can't access or do anything about it. Seems like your system not "Jenius" enough, I think?

Everytime I change my debit card limit it will automatically change itself to a certain lower amount. My subscription has failed the payment due to this issue even though I have enough money. On top of that, somehow now I cannot change my card limit and it just shows me a white screen of death. Are you doing this so you can charge me extra fee for the failed payment? I am frustrated, this is NOT cool! Fix your app!

This is serious, tetangga sebelah bikin TMRW, apps needs to update, not just update but some kind rearchitect. It needs to cache data, you don't need to be native but at least be responsive. No kidding the transfer fund experience from competitor apps was so smooth. In here you need to at least clicks few buttons and unnecessary steps to finally transfer fund. Not to mention the load time feels like a travel to planet Namek.

I'm so sorry for giving you 1 star. I have a problem with login with my fingerprint and my PIN. I tried more than 3 times, but it still failed. So, i restarted my phone and login it back. Firstly, it took about 1 minute for Jenius app to process my fingerprint. When the app still got lag, i tried to cancel my "Dream Save It", but 'till now it's still on "Processing to Cancel" loading page and my balance doesn't change. So, please fix it ASAP! I love Jenius so much, it helped me a lot.

Same problem with everyone. Can't login. Things I learned from this problem, DON'T EVER PUT YOUR MONEY IN ONE PLACE, the trust I gave to this platform is collapsing. I've been considering to use another new platform since they give same privileges as jenius, and importantly they are reputable. Their prev apps is not so 'good looking' but it is stable. Meanwhile since the first time I use Jenius, the app NEVER load fast, there was time when I can't use the fingerprint lock for months, ETC.

funny how the amazing features of this app still can't make me forgive the super slow, sluggish, glitchy, error-prone UX. you have the audacity to charge your credit card users 500k + 120k feesible a year for this terrible app with tons of errors and failed transactions? you're joking. it's been years yet your improvement is literally close to none. we still have many options for digital banking apps with speedy performance and fairer charge, so you better be on the mend.

This app really give me headache. Can't login to the app on the new phone. Whenever I try to enter email and password, after that it automatically push me back to the login page. It says my 'session is expired', EVERYTIME!.. while the other banking app are easy to switch and use on new phone, more comfortable and seamless banking experience than this one. Sigh.

I've been using genius since the beginning of the they run the apps. It's getting worst, now I can't log in to my account, I try to reach through email, Instagram, call center. There's no response or solutions to fix this. Charge fee also expensive! I really not recommended to use this apps. It's not safe at all and very low response.

Lately it's so unstable. My balance aren't showing, hard to login, can't transfer my money, and the loading took a really long time, eventhough my internet connection was really fast to open other internet related apps. This hapoens really often like every week. I was an early adopter & promote this to all my friends. But now the app really sucks.

Gave this app 2 stars because of the experience I have experienced before with the staff of Jenius, and my review disappeared (I have been lied on to, they said topups, transfers and withdrawals were free, but it actually had conditions for it to be free, and they explained it to me AFTER I did a topup and got charged). I'm sorry but I will give you only 1 star this time. I also sometimes have troubles logging in to the apps, it just sometimes freeze after I insert my pin

Super laggy. History of transactions sometimes couldn't load properly. You can't use this app when in rush. Too much widgets that sometimes frustrated you. I don't need Moneytory or other widgets, and users can't choose to not having any widgets at all, users being forced to choose ONE widget that makes everything's laggy. All i need is a straight-forward internet banking to transfer, provide balance amount, and in-out transactions in 5 seconds when i open the app.

Surprisingly slow performance, what happened Jenius? I always failed to activate account. First attempted, connected to Jenius Crew, and suddenly in the middle of video call session, it crashed. I tried it again within 5 minutes, and that was same. Tried another way, I left message on Twitter Official, they gave suggestion, cleared cache, re-installed, tried to activate account (again) and none of that fixed my problem.

Please think twice if you want to start saving at Jenius, the apps is taking too long to load even the homepage, let alone do the saving or bank transfer. I never ever successfully downloaded the receipt even though the feature was there. To make it worse, it has been months this issue occured to me. As a long time user of mobile banking of some other bank with very simple yet responsive application, i think i will be thinking to move all my saving if this issue still persist.

Developer (and management who I'm sure prioritize product delivery in-time rather than good quality) doesn't seem to know how to make a good front-end app. Every tap, every action results in some delay before anything happening. I know everything takes time to load or process but, UI should always react to user input immediately. Show loading animation if load or process needed. Using this app is so tiring because it feels so slow to do anything.

when changing phone, can't login to new devices, because "session expired, need to login" without any notification that we can only use 1 devices. and in the app can't unlink the devices unless we call the customer service. So confusing because there is no information on the app about this 1 app only policy. please add option to unlink devices in the app and give notification if there is login on new devices that we need to unlink first. very bad experience with Jenius.. not recommended for the long term

I am so disappointed with your app and services. I can't load my profile, I can't buy phone credit. Always "Ooops something went wrong". Slow response from the agents, I asked one thing they answered different. Like that song goes, it was great at the very start. Now it sucks!

Huge waste of time. Everything was running smooth until the videocall account activation. I've completed the videocalls and giving all the information needed, after waiting for a full day, the account activation window pops up again. I tried to contact the help center and was told to do the activation again and wait for 24 hours. I already done this process for three times now, and contact the CS everytime the issue occurs, still nothing happen. Not even gonna try anymore.

Updated this app to latest version, but still, the problem is still exist but for it isn't force closing anymore. The problem is the page always failed to load. And this thing always happen, like, always eventho my connection in a perfect stat. Its not good for banking app. What if i need my account in emergency situation and my page failed to load then i cant access my account? Please, fix this!

Very slow banking app, sometime its work, sometime you re lucky you can see your balance. The design is good, many feature too, but i dont think that "essential" for banking app if you can't even see your own balance and do simple task most banking app do. And few days ago, out of nowhere, they didn't recognize my Fingerprint and PIN number, I try to update to latest version but the problem still there, and I need to use "forgot password" to enter my account. Please fix your app performance.

Tried to open the app through both code pin and biometric, always says it has network issues, even though my connection has never been unstable with both wifi on and off. It's always like this with the password reset, too. Very frustrating, very easy to lose temper to and a god awful user experience. Fix your servers and app, please.

UI revamp was very bad. Interface got much harder to use & now requires more steps to do a task. Not to mention the most important thing in a banking app - RELIABILITY. This app is very laggy despite being ran on most recent flagship phones (both android & iOS). Hard to use interface with many steps required to complete a step + Slow performance = Recipe for very bad UX. Without the flexi saver, I'm sure you would lose 50%+ of your users.

I tried to register twice with different phone number and email. The first time I never get the OTP. The second one, verification rejected. I guess I will stick to my old banks and won't use your service. What an irony, because I could get a CC in major bank without problem but can't open a saving account in Jenius Wasting time and very bad experiences.

Jenius was my favorite banking apps previously. Unfortunately, my mind has changed drastically when I face the problems without any responses from Help Center. Jenius was dissapointing me even I could not log in to my account. Everytime I tried in IOS to sign in, the navigator directed me to log out automatically. I tried in Android to re-install, the application was pending without any estimation time. This unreliability system makes me anxious.I completely agree that I will move to another one

I am disappointed. I think registration via online is easier and has no obstacles the same as one of the online wallet applications. but it didn't. after several times I registered through the application and kept the time so as not to get too close to registering over and over again it turned out to be the same. still wrong in pin making. I hope that someday this application can be used by everyone easily and does not make it difficult for others

first review, 2 üåü; now it gets worse.. video-call activation from this app is basically TRASH! I was connected to my TWS & yet, the voice cannot be heard from my TWS & instead delivered through my phone's speaker, which is way TOO FAINT! not to mention its repetitive SERVER TIME OUT notice that often cuts me halfway during my activation call!! This app presents you frustration rather than convenience I daresay..

If i could give minus star, i would. I have noticed the slow input for login pin for months and I'm fine with it, switched to fingerprint login. Now it doesn't even read my fingerprints, and didn't let me sign in with pin, keep notifying my pin is wrong eventhough i punched the button one by one. I had been forced to change my password and pin because i input the correct one just because the app won't let me in. Other than that the app itself is quite flexible and user friendly.

Hey im a loyal customer of jenius apps since 2018, but somehow this apps is getting worse and worse. My connection on this apps only were really slow. I changed it from wifi to mobile data and vice versa and the apps is still slow in processing anything. I thought it was my phone issue but it wasnt. Im using xiaomi redmi note 8 please take a look at this issue. Ps, im not bringing any administration fee issue. Just please fix the problem thanks

Failed to login on new device. It keep saying session is expired and automatically log out. Once trying to logout on old device it will invinite loop on asking pin and re login. It can be force logout by clearing cache and data. Unfortunately the last state on the server remain login. And now account cannot login from anywhere else. Good job Jenius dev team. Here is my suggestions, once we being asked to input an OTP it means the login is verified. So the last device should be overridden.

PLEASE FIX ASAP ! The content is good, as usual. But with this new update the app becomes EXTREMELY SLOW (on various wifi as well as my phone LG G7+ thinq w indosat im3). I tried the web version as well and similar slowness. Reloading takes forever ! Previous versions were already generally slower than other banking apps i have, incl. traditional banks & jenius competitors. With the easiness of transfer to anywhere, people can just move their assets and jenius lose customers for slow app.

A very bad app. I almost never give a bellow 4 star review, but this app is beyond irritating that I just had to leave it at 1-star. The app is ironically inconvenient for a e-banking that supposedly was made to make transactions easier. It took more than 5 minutes to simply top up my e-wallet, 5 minutes to transfer money, on some days it does not even pass the loading screen (it refuses my pin). I left a review because I haven't given up on Jenius yet, but please - improve.

this app used to be good but now it really SUCKS. like literally sucks. it keeps crashing when I try to open the app over and over again, I have reinstalled but the problem persist. now I cant access my account! Try to call the help center but it's useless. I've read some review and some people are experiencing the same problem as me, BYE JENIUS !

App is really slow. Sometimes it redirects to jenius splash screen, and just stuck there, then I had to reopen the app again. Notifications systems sucks too. I got two SMS that states me I had change my number into unknown number. I don't know if someone trying to get into my account or just the their SMS system that broken, since the number in my account did not changes.

It's a great app, untill you want to change your device, it will turns into so much problems. The other banks didn't need to do anything for change the main device. This is a "digital bank", right? Please upgrade your methods to make the user comfortable using the app, or at least enable multi device (smartphone). Thanks

The app is slow, the loading is slow, the connection to the server is always bad. It fails too often when you're about to make a transaction, and you have to redo again, retype the password again, fail again. "Ooooops something went wrong" Yes, your app is.

Slow response time indeed got me frustrated everytime I try to make any purchases at every services this app provides, even when I have such an excelent wifi connection. Been using this banking app service since day 1 Jenius launched, and guess what, you have just lost a customer. NOT WORTH IT ANYMORE!!! I prefer BLU or NEO instead. They got faster response time

This app is really the worst finance app I've ever had. First, you will not be allowed to login because "services are busy". And if you tried to try the next time, you will be log out and need to enter username and password with new device pin. Don't try to hope it will get better, it shows "uknown error". How does we know what is wrong if you don't know? If you try to send email, it will ask you to call its call centre and voila 20 minutes spending your time with nothing cause "busy".

The application lags a lot. I cannot quickly access the information on my dashboard and transfer my money because it keeps loading the data. At times, the application says my PIN is incorrect even though I don't change it. And for fingerprint authentication, it's basically useless now. Please fix those problems immediately.

Really bad user experience. I keep getting forced to log out every time I try to log in. When I asked customer service, they recommended that I visit their office. However, they don't have an office in New Zealand. Just remove the digital bank title from your bank.
Very slow response. You have a bug, I twice create schedule transfer but there is no schedule created and no message appear.

Slow, frequently down at inconvenient times. Weird scrolling behavior when seeing in & out transactions. Customer service reply window time was ridiculously short, powered by the staff that doesn't care. They tend to quickly finish a help whenever it's becoming inconvenient for them. What's nice? Update: Unresponsive during pin input to access the app (spoiler: it cannot be accessed). Terrible experience during online payment. The money was transferred but the well known travel agent did not receive the payment. Sluggish performance and lower interest rate every now and then. It's okay to pay Feesible but please make the interest high as it used to be. Thankfully it still offers online debit for accessibility. Kudos to the customer service for fast response.

The service itself is good, it makes saving and managing your money easier. The problem is the app, it is so slow, so clunky, especially with the new update. I couldn't even log in. If you're in a rush, you'll lose your temper waiting for the app to work. Frankly we don't need an update of the UI, the old UI worked just fine. We need the app to work faster and more stable. Edit: there were 2 updates after I write this review, but still no improvement.

The app is working so seriously slow, crashing a lot and currently the notification didn't pop out when there was a payment had been paid or anything. Also e-card now it didn't mention the money got debited for what, only Visa Merchant Payment, but yes, I know, to make sure if my card was secure I need to know what was that for. And for those reasons, lately I feel insecure to use the app. Please make it better and secure to use daily.

Very slow and very lagging compare to other apps. UI and UX sometime confusing and not clear what, why, when, and how. And it easily put me out of the app while I was looking for number or another bank account for seconds. It's an annoying app. Edited in response to BTPN : Yes, my internet is stable and very fast. I use fast internet (broadband) from Indihome. Many reviewers also said the same about the slowliness and lagging of Genius. Please improve that, BTPN.

Long story short, at first, this app is very convenient. After a few tweaks and updates, it is so hard to see my saver balance without it have to be refreshed over and over again. The "failed to upload data" notification keeps coming and it really frustrates me when I need to do an immediate transfer or checking. Shouldn't have gone from hero to zero.

It's a good app, revolutional. The downside is, I don't like how I have to call the call center just to unlock my device when I want to move the app to another phone. It's just so unnecessary, time consuming, annoying, and it consumes money (pulsa) to call the call center. Other banking app can do just fine without annoying step like this.

After updated, the connection become more slowly. I tried to open other apps like ig, tt, fb, etc, it's running smoothly and fastly. I think the problem is from Jenius apps, the connection is very slow, i can't open jenius dashboard, save it, etc, all of it, it's just loading loading error, and then try again, loading, error, and always like that, please fix it!!!!!!!!!!!

The app is quite slow, even slower than heavy games I've had on my phone. I've also been having this problem where I can't set up Fingerprint Login, and asking on Twitter didn't help much either :/ Online support will just asks you to contact them by phone later... Whenever I try to activate Fingerprint Login, after it asks my PIN, it's supposed to ask me to scan my finger. But in my case, after entering my PIN the app just errors out "Oops.. your fingerprint is not recognized." What a shame.

I'm about to register into Jenius when it asks for a photo of my KTP. When I took a picture of it, it's always blurry and tapping the screen doesn't allow me to refocus? So every photo of my KTP is very, very blurry. (My camera works in all other apps to refocus, but not in Jenius, I tried like 7 times but all is blurry). I honestly don't know what to do, so I uninstalled it.

I really liked this app. I have been using it for my electronic payments to buy ebooks in Google Play Book. But there are some things I dislike. Firstly, there's no other way to access it on new smartphone unless I contact the call center to get the app unlinked on my old phone. It is both time and cost consuming because I have to have "pulsa" while you know nowadays people rely mostly on internet-based calls and messages. Your app is based on internet so why don't make it simpler? Secondly, the respond in help center through chat is too slow responding. I bought an ebook and my card was declined in the e-commerce but the balance in my account was cut two times. I understand that there will be some troubles like this but please do respond quickly. I had to explain my trouble two times to two different people because of the slow responding. Please do improve this.

At the first time I loved this app, so many features and everything looks easy, I even promoted this bank to my friends. But recently the app is so laggy, even only open a page it's need to wait for 15-30 seconds. This is not reliable as a banks app. Further more I experienced failure in transferring my money to other bank few days ago. Lucky for me that the amount is small. And I need to wait more than 7 working days for the money credited to my account. I consider to close my bank account.

The features are great, and older versions of the app used to run smoothly. However, these past few versions are so bad I can't even login, and when I do, the app is so slow I'm quite hesistant to do any transactions in case my funds get stuck on an error. From the social media comments I'm not alone on this, so please fix the app!

At first, everything is fine. But after the update to make more dream saver and flexi saver, my jenius cannot use the feature anymore. I can only use one flexi saver, everytime i want to make the new flexi saver, it's just not there. I already complain about the problem for my dream saver, but it still not resolved yet. Still showing "error from the internal server"

Well this is an edited rating apps from 5 stars to 2 stars. Jenius please! Your Apps is freaking SLOW to load up! Even with high speed internet connection it's not even getting better at all! Just make it simple animation. Oh and please make UI simpler, I'm kinda tired to scrolling down if I wanna choose from one menu to other menu. Can you just make it in one single screen that has all menus.

The chat keeps connecting for some reason and I can't even once talk with the operator. Trying to log out and guess what happened, it shows the PIN entry page (with the fingerprint) and once I entered the PIN it only took me back to my dashboard. Here's the thing, the concept and the whole service itself is good. But admit it your app doesn't.

I oftenly experienced difficulty when logging in, and the app tends to pop up an error message when I'm trying to make a transfer. Moreover, the app itself is quite slow comparing to other banks' apps. All in all, Jenius is not a reliable banking app, at least for now, and definitely made me think to switch into another bank.

Superb concept, poor execution: great many features, but very bad application. It is very very unresponsive, it takes time to load even the main menu, and more time to show data. Please optimize the app so that it can provide seamless experince just like any other banking application.

I've came to love Jenius so much but lately I have to say that this app has been frustrating me so much!! Lags, disconnections, and such. Especially today, I got a new phone and tried to install the app onto the new phone, but every time I tried to log in it says that my session has expired and logged me out automatically each time!!! I've had no problems with my previous phone, so why did this happen? I'll improve the rating if the app is better!

The app (including the lastest update) becomes painfully slow. It takes ages only to open the app. It takes another ages to log in. Every single tap and step takes very long time. 30 minutes is wasted away only to transfer money. You now take montlhy fee, you should be better than this, don't you think? Or do you think that it's time to earn back your burning money?

I read a lot of glowing reviews for Jenius (the service, not the app), so I thought I'd give it a try. When I got to the play store page, I saw a lot of 1*-2* reviews, but the overall rating is still 4.4* or something, thus I installed it and registered anyway. BIG MISTAKE. This is, by far, the clunkiest "digital" bank app I've ever used, even the new kids on the block (B** and L***) is much, much better. I had to do the video call activation thingy SIX TIMES because everytime it would either freeze or not showing anything (I used several different phone operators but the same thing happen). Past that fiasco, logging in takes 15-30 seconds to load the main page, and it takes another 5-10 seconds to do every. single. thing. If I change focus to another app I will be asked to login again (which will repeat the whole waiting game). I haven't really tried the service, but my overall assessment so far: MEDIOCRE. With the addition of the monthly fee, the new assessment is: BELOW AVERAGE. What "digital" bank charges a monthly fee anyway? What a sham!

Problems with logging in have been occurring for MONTHS now. Fingertip login got an update, but still causes problems. Pin login is buggy as well. This app is SLOW even for my phone with 8GB of RAM. App is heavy on resource-consumption, and clearly not well-optimised. I genuinely love the concept & features Jenius offer, but the app sucks and needed a major revamp & performance optimisation from the developer's end.

it was really good, a digital banking app that was easy to use and reliable. but now you are adding this "feesible" thing, which is just monthly banking fees that CONFLICT with your promises in the past about not having any monthly fees. its not about the Rp10.000 its about not fulfillig your promises in the past.

This app is really useful when I need to prepare for my study abroad with no credit card. It also helps me to pay my Netflix subscription. But when it comes to helping daily transactions, it really fruatrates me. Better erase the CS 'chat' features on the app. It really is no use!!

I was a satisfied customer of Jenius. Almost nothing ever went wrong so was pretty confused about the complaints from other people. Just yesterday however I lost my phone and had to download+log in from the new device. It kept on saying session has expired and log me out automatically. Can't log in until now. Now i see what the fuss is all about. Please help fix. Thank you.

I use Jenius since 2015, at thatgtime they might be one of the pioneers of digital banking, but now with more competitors, Jenius should moving forward especially regarding the slow app. Even with the state-owned Banks, Jenius app is super slow. I like Jenius, especially it comes with different saving pockets, however you can do better to make an upgrade for the app.

CONGRATULATION!1!1!1! YOU JUST CREATED THE MOST UNRELIABLE FACIAL RECOGNITION FEATURE I'VE EVER USED ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ or perhaps it's consistently failing because I'm not a human ü§®ü§®ü§® what "face the camera directly" even means(??) üòûüòû

Face recognition is so bad, always no face detected in the end, waste of time. No issue with other bank's face recognition. What's worse, this is required to install the app to other device. Maybe I should just transfer out all my balance and forget about this app altogether
cant login, always force close whenafter showing intro blue screen
Bad ux, I can't find topup button which is should be easily found
How come after updated I couldn't log in. Pls check if there was bugs in the updated version
Updated to the latest version, then stuck di layar intro logo jenius!

I transferred IDR 3 mil to my account. I can see the number updated. I went straight transfer 2 mil into 2 Flexi savings account. But now my active balance is going back to the original amount before the transfer. Please fix this problem.
The loading's taking too much time. I lost my patience over and over again. Refresh, reloading and reopening it doesn't help at all.

It is really hard to call CS!! What is also annoying is that it could give you a notification from a cc transaction that i did 2 days ago! Imagine sitting down on you couch at 8am with the cc in your wallet and then you read a notification that says your cc has just been charge an xxx amount of rupiah etc etc. You would've thought someone hacks your cc! If this notif keeps happening, then i wouldnt notice if oneday someone really actually hacks your cc!

You guys have just successfully turned one of the top-notch, premium-class, user-friendly, BEST banking app in Indonesia (maybe ASEAN), into a big bulk of nothing. It WAS perfect. It WAS fast. It WAS reliable. Thanks to those disturbing updates, now it becomes a RAM-consuming, jammed flop. Bye, J. So sad. Time to find another bank.

Slowest app i have ever experienced. The practicality is great, flexi saver, maxi saver. Also the ability get report of money spend in different categories is also great. But the apps just too slow! Please optimise your apps codes to be more efficient. All of the great things this app has is degraded by the slow loading of this apps.
It's very slow especially if you have time sensitive condition like when cashier is waiting for you to load QRIS to scan QR, please fix the responsiveness or loading time of the app.

The customer service experience is pretty horrible, not the agents but it's the 15 seconds window instead. When you ask something to the agent they tend to ask you to wait, while you wait there's going to be this 15 seconds countdown, you need to confirm you're still there. Otherwise the chat ends on its own, really dumb system, this causes me to keep texting me the cs again because the chat keeps getting ended.

Nice app but the bank itself solves your case slower than a snail. I've rang the CS for several times since November 2019 and they always told me that they needed some extra time working on the case. It's not a big amount of money, but it sure makes the bank losing its customer's trust. The chat feature is also terrible. No CS responded to the chat and the annoying "are you still there" keeps popping up while it's me the one who's waiting for the CS to respond.

Everything's working just fine, the app is quite complete but has friendly UI. Except when I needed it the most, i had these experiences when i already transferred to money, but transactions have not been complete till the next next day. It happened when i tried to buy phone credits and other urgent things. Sad, i'll give 5 star when this issue is solved.

Good features, poor execution. App is laggy, occasionally crashes, and is sometimes unresponsive. I like the design and workflow, but the app need further optimization. Doing 5 or more transfer in a row is a hassle because we need to wait for it to restart after being unresponsive.

It became slower slower and slower . This apps was good at first. But its really frustrating right now. I cant even load my balance and save it feature. And it makes me doubt the functionality or even the safety of this apps. And starting considering another alternatives.

Good app but long loading time. E.g open screen, switch to see wealth, move balances, make transfers. Compared to other mbanking app, this one takes time in switching pages. Perhaps consider not tp load every info all at once and use simpler icons. Also many bugs (e.g unable to download transfer receipt from in/out)

I tried opening the app this morning. I've tried both fingerprint login and pin code login, but I can't get in. The loading takes very long, and I can't still get in. Please fix this. Edit: I tried logging in with fingerprint, and it still didn't work. It said something about the connection

What happened to the update? The apps worked flawlessly before. But now I've tried 8 times to log in & always failed (after being asked to change my PIN coz biometric didn't work). I can't log in because the apps always considered I type the wrong PIN during second verification. After 8 attempts I uninstall the apps. Strangely, after I reinstall I can change my PIN and do 1 transaction. But error happened again & I got to repeat the process again. Right now I give up until the apps being fixed

I used to give you guys 5 stars but after this recent updates and along the year you made some questionable decisions like feesible, reducing interest money and not choosing to upgrade your server to give a better in app experience, so it's a very disappointing journey especially from last year, good luck on keeping us as your loyal customer from the start üçª

Jenius was my favorite banking apps previously, and I have put most of my money. However Jenius disappoint me a lot these days - can't login d/t changing phone, history not shown (always in maintenance mode and they only can resolve it at 8am WIB), and new UI makes it a lot longer to load. The unreliability system makes me feeling anxious & insecure; thinking to move money to other Bank for more security.

Overall experience is decent, but the customer service chat need improvements. It looks like the customer service people can't get the context since every chat session is a new session and therefore chat messages are lost, so even every bit of interruptions (internet disconnect, timeout, etc) means a new chat session and all the context are lost, even when the customer's problem haven't been solved. Please update the application so that each chat session can be saved and read by the custops

The new interface is better for me, more simple. But the loading speed is getting slower. It's take almost more than 10s just for the opening page. While other mbanking are getting faster with nice and clean UI.

Just changed my phone. Need to log in on my new phone (obviously) but i can't. The app says the session is expired but how can it be expired if i haven't even actually log in? The email notif said to log out of the old device but i already reset it and to call the call center. Tried calling but was kept on hold. Tried emailed but there's no response. DM-ed their ig but told to cal the call center (which doesn't work like i said previously). Please fix this soon. I need my account.

The loading takes too long as if it's a heavy app, it's inconvenient. My internet connection is good but the dashboard makes me reload the page all over again. Sometimes the app stops working and closes by itself. You should take BNI Mobile Banking app as an example.

For digital banking jenius was pioneer in Indonesia, you guys disrupt it good, but sadly the features and convenience can't keep up. The app new-UI feels like smoke-and-mirror to hide lot of old broken functionalities that never improved (no verbose trx status and lot of small things). Jenius has lost it's competitive advantages by stop growing up and especially with recent block to major payment provider (PayPal, Google etc) makes using the app no longer worth it.

Sluggish UI and poor app loading speed regardless of internet speed. Quite onnoying Login issue & can't do a transaction sometimes. These issues don't always happen all the time, but it's a mess when it comes to a time where we are having urgent transaction.

I've been using Jenius for 2 years, I think Jenius doesn't really consider the things that customers put value for. Their new features are good, but not essential. The app is so sluggish, whenever I open the app, need about 1-2 minutes before I can access anything. Then, now I need to pay the "feesible" for features that don't add much value for my experience. In addition, the helpdesk didn't respond to my email at all. It's unfortunate but I have no reason to continue to use Jenius any longer.

One thing that needs to be improved from this application is that the session ends quickly; for example when you're in the transaction process, then you switch the application to the background, when you return, you're asked to enter the password again and your transaction process is lost alias you've to start from the beginning. The worst thing is when you need Jenius Help, you can't take your eyes off this application because otherwise your chat with CS will be ended suddenly.

Okay I have a fingerprint trouble with my old phone. It didn't work. So after I buy the new one, I still get the same trouble. Come on.. if the feature is not supporting all devices, especially updated ones, better fix it or remove it. Make me insecure.

Fix the new device registration system or you'll keep bleeding users. Why should we call the call center just to register a new device. Give us browser page where we can manage our devices on our own or something the like. If you want extra security, make it so that a certain device registered can be flagged as master device that cant be logged out or fiddled with through the browser page. Not this pain in the butt system. Until this issue is fixed, the star will stay at 2

The app frequently lags and now I have difficulty log in, first they ask the finger print, which failed with unknown reason, then pin, which failed again with unknown reason also. It happen quite often but this time took more than 24 hours, and it hasnt been resolved or repaired. :(

review update after 4yrs using jenius: this app is good but it keeps on charging me IDR 5k for every declined transaction. this is very annoying. most of the time i already moved my funds from save it to my main account but the fund switch process LAGS (even when it says fund switching is successful!) that the payment request from e-commerce got to jenius first before the fund actually finished switching. this is not fair to the customers. im not doing transactions with jenius anymore.

Good feature, but the apps is sooo slow. I waited for OTP and its not appeared on my inbox. Upgrade your server or something, i dunno what make it so sluggish. I need to do transaction but got hold because of the slow response.

It used to be so good, smooth. But now I can't even transfer to an account which I just accessed from another bank app. It says 'the savings account is no longer valid", but I can open the account I want to send to easily. Huft

Honestly, I don't mind the monthly fee at all, as long as there's a significant improvement with the app. But so far all I got is headache from this app because of how slow it is, and the app won't even let me log in w/ my fingerprint, and that is on a good day. On a bad day I can't even log in with my PIN, it's ridiculous.

everything was fine, but just right now I'm about to transfer something important and i can't get through the front page of the app, nothing show up when i input my password manually or using fingerprints it just stay at the front page. i've tried to restart my phone nd update the app but nothing change ! please help !

I tried to pay for my Google subscription using a genius e-card but the app is slow and because I tried again and again, I was charged for insufficient funds 9 times. So I lost IDR 45,000 and didn't get any explanation for the cost. It was a bad experience.

Previous UI is better. Now it's too 'clean' and confusing. Fingerprint login can't be used. Logged out too soon; less than 2 minutes when checking on other apps. I'm really close to switch to other online bank.

I never used this app for any other payment except for Netflix and for savings. It keeps charge me a huge amount of monthly fees and taxes. I used Jenius to keep my savings, but now it charge me so big that i'm afraid to top up. For a student like me it is very inconvenient.

I really like how Jenius works and it's compatible with most of my overseas purchases HOWEVER!!! PLEASE GET THE APP FIXED!!! I have been using Jenius for over a year; you've had Moneytory, slight new updates here and there but were there any improvements for user experience at all? Every time I login I always have to brace myself for errors, top-ups, money sending often fails during business hours etc. I'd like to keep using Jenius so PLEASE PLEASE DO SOMETHING ABOUT THE UX, THANK YOU.

I just started to log in to my account. But it failed, I've tried it many times and still failed. Disclaimer : I using the correct email and password and started to create my new pin. But my session had expired and log out automatically

I used to love jenius, is so usefull and handy for saving and transactions, but now the apps often lags and takes a long time to even open.. And about the penalty fee of insufficient balance? Really.. And the monthly fees? Eventhough i cant see any improvement on the service or the app itself is very disappointing üòû

Dissapointed. Have used this app for long time enough. But recently I changed my phone and cannot log in at all. It says that my session has been expired and logged out. I have tried to log in again but cannot and same message appeared.

Actually I really really love this app on the functionality side. I mean, its the first that have cool features that I, as user, really need in a banking app. But then these days, you frequently maintain the app at the time when people still use it, day time, evening time and it makes us the users cant login or make a transaction. It's annoying. I mean, you know banking is really important, and let the user cant access they money? Come on. Pick night time or after midnight to maintain your app!!

For God sake Jenius! Fix your server or whatsoever it is, just fix your app!! It takes about HALF AN HOUR just to withdraw my money from saving to main balance and top up my e-wallet. I couldn't log in to my account due the forever loading. I had to try many freakin times to log in to my account. I used to happy to use you. Now, with the monthly fee and those experiences, you just gone worse. Shame on you!

Halo Jenius, many things need to fix and improved. Failed to register because option of province doesn't appear , also very difficult to take pic of ID card, it always blur even use additional lighting devices and tripod stand.

internal camera from this application is not working properly. Surrounding lighting was good and bright enough. Taking ID picture always comes out blurred. tried the standard camera on my phone, the camera is working alright so i guess it's the app not my camera.

Best innovation from Indonesia since Indomie goreng. Jenius makes my life much easier. Hassle free banking. Edit: The updates messed it up: Fingerprint login still broken for me but it's fine with for my friend with the same device. CS said the feature is still in 'development'. They're developing the feature since forever.

The app is super slow! My phone gas great hardware and the connection is not even slow. Please update the app and make it lighter. It's very painful whenever had to use the app in emergency situation.

i can't even activate my account, when using video call activation after connected the apps suddenly close and restarted. i've been try 3times and its still not work. my internet connection are reliable and stable , there's no problem on my side. is there any work out on this?

This is a good app, user friendly ui and ux, plenty of useful features that I love to use. IF and this is a big IF, the app loads. This has been a persistent issue for a few years now. I don't know who is being stingy at BTPN for not fixing this issue. Or maybe they don't care about the future of this app.

E-wallet center is very buggy, often failed to add or top up an e-wallet. The error sign doesn't tell much about the problem though: "Oops, something went wrong, please try again later", very helpful for us users eh Jenius?

The UI is actually good, but now that I changed my device, I can't log in. Whenever I finish creating a pin code for my app, it always redirects me back to the start with a red popping notification saying "Your session has expired. You're now logged out automatically". Heck.

I used to love Jenius for its sub-accounts fiturs. perfect for emergency fund and sinking fund. but since lately it is annoying because hard to login, can't access the movement, can't do transactions, and fingerprint login doesn't work anymore for me. you charge feasible fee, but your service is getting worse üò≠

Feesible didn't bring anything new. The promos are dwindling, no more Monyay transfer fee cashback. It's not even registered with BI-fast! The flexi cash is weird because even when 1 million is saved for the whole month, the average balance came up short. With more digital banks coming up recently, people are going to leave Jenius if it can't compete with the services they offer, mostly for free.

Hello there, Jenius used to be my favourite digital banking application beside my payroll bank for its abundance feature. But lately I have problem in which we failed to login to new device. It keeps giving me session expired error so I had to give this rating firstüòÄ please fix it and I'll adjust the rating later. Thank you.

I intended to see what saving plans Jenius have now, but i have issue with login. 1. I input pass and email as usual 2. I was asked to create pin for phone login 3. And after that i created pin, app said that session is expired. Then, it was redirected to page before login. It happened 3 times. Please solve this issue.

In terms of banking & business value, I should conclude that Jenius is good. But for apps sake, please do improve: 1) fingerprint login is a mess, I use this type of login for many other apps and work properly, but not with Jenius 2) please make your apps lighter. It keeps on loading and very time consuming. It is such a disgrace for a frontier Digital Bank in Indonesia. You have been in the market since 2016, the apps should've been upgraded due to many feedbacks. 3) CS Chat no response.

Very sloow...can't use app for immediate respond transaction...even in Samsung Note 9...it is veryyy sloow...I will use other bank offering if I found one with the same promotion for ATM and transfer. I will not encourage other to use this app...very slow and not reliable in urgent condition.

Now I downgraded with previous version and it works fine. Hi Developer! Please fix the bugs. New version is bad! It crashed when I try to open it after I enter my pin. The apps closed suddenly. I used oppo F1 with OS 5.2 You think my Device did not support with the new version??

Why I can't log-in, it keeps saying "your sessions has expired. You're now logged out automatically." I've tried more than 5X till putting the code & set-up pin. I've updated the app version too, but still failed. So, how I take back my money? Please help to solve asap!

I can't open my jenius apps since yesterday. The apps always request to be updated yet once i click the update button, the apps always request to free my storage. I don't have any issue with the low storage. Please fix it.

I logged in the Jenius apps on my old smartphone. After my old smartphone broken (I didn't have chance to logged out on my old smartphone), I can't login in my new smartphone. It said "Your session has expired. You are now logged out automatically." Please help me to solve this problem. Thank you.

Why is it getting slower in performance and longer in loading the homepage? With all due respect I do not care of any sophisticated features or gen-z friendly design; I want a reliable digibank application. Taking too long in loading the homepage when I'm in a rush to transfer money is nowhere to reliable.

OMG, Jenius. I just updated this app and I miss the old version of you which don't take much time for loading. Please fix this, thank you. And also, I used this app to using Flexi saver feature and since we have to paid 10rb for admin fees, I think it's too expensive like everyone said. I hope Jenius management could make better regulation in the future. Thanks.

All the features are really great, but the app itself is so laggy. I hope your team can improve that. I've been using this app for years and there had been many updates, yet there still hasn't been any improvement in that area :(

The app looks good but I can't even register. When I set up my password and PIN, it keeps sending me error messages. I tried to chek and re-input it for several times (and I am quite sure that I did it right) but it did not work üôÅ

got very inconvenient experience for this last week. unable to use fingerprint login, and suddenly unable to open the dashboard because of infinity loader just wont stop. still able to use though using the left navbar. please fix it immediately

still not reliable to be used as main account since the system is super slow and often erroneous - especially during paydays. for many times, they cant find the beneficiaries' bank accounts for transfer transactions. they also cant accommodate payment of CCs issued by most of Himbara banks and BCA. i actually love your app for the unpopular genius features but you definitely need to work much harder on your app dev, Jenius!

I love this app because of the feature. But please can you make an update for this so the app can run faster like before. The loading time is so slow like snail c'mon fix this. I love your feature so please make this app run faster.

I got an "oops, wrong PIN" everytime i tried to login. And i have no idea why my account can't be activated. The only clue i got is just an email saying that there are some requirements that i missed. But it's only that. What did i do wrong? What requirements do i miss? No idea Not a pleasant experience | edit/update: just don't register online, see an outlet and let the admin do it for you

You must fix your server. The app always loading. It is so slow just to log in. I want to check my in & out transactions but it's tell "reload" for more than 10 times, i give up and don't ask about the time for every transaction, its load too long.

Dear Jenius, I hope you are doing well. Everyone seems to be putting angry reviews since your new policy last month for mandatory device unlink each time user reset their phone/got new phone. I've updated the app to the newest version and as I have changed to a new phone, and the app always said "session terminated" turns out that you have new policy for device unlinking WHICH I NEVER HEARD until that unsuccessful login and password reset attempted which also failed to login because it expects to see the registered device.Why not build a challenge-response and 2FA method is beyond me. Your competitor seems to have better implementation of this but still not recommended yet due to low exposure and still in its infancy.. Many untrusted sources said your 2secure page is ongoing maintenance but they said the truth is "it is closed permanently" I like many features of Jenius but if it is going to continue like this, it will not end in a good way. Your PR team maybe doing very good but it is very disappointing to see Customer Services that being unhelpful and slow at times, not to mention AppDev that maybe disappointed to see the app not accepted gracefully by the user. It is also disappointing to see that Jenius is related to SMBC which has good reputation in Japanese Customers. If any of your staff seen this review please kindly see to my ticket ID, I submitted through Sinaya BTPN for unlinking my old device : CAS-21-DN5856 Update: After one more time contacting your Call Center, it came to light that unlinking previous device includes possibilities of other devices linked. It should have been educated to all call center staffs that were on the frontline and receiving inquiries so as to not wasting customer time on the phone waiting system. A user may have possibilities to restart their phone and / or reinstalled Jenius on their phones after a Os reinstall many times. Thank God (and lucky me) all devices were now unlinked. I'll continue to use the app and update the review accordingly.

I really liked this app. I have been using it for my electronic payments to buy ebooks in Google Play Book. But there are some things I dislike. Firstly, there's no other way to access it on new smartphone unless I contact the call center to get the app unlinked on my old phone. It is both time and cost consuming because I have to have "pulsa" while you know nowadays people rely mostly on internet-based calls and messages. Your app is based on internet so why don't make it simpler? Secondly, the respond in help center through chat is too slow responding. I bought an ebook and my card was declined in the e-commerce but the balance in my account was cut two times. I understand that there will be some troubles like this but please do respond quickly. I had to explain my trouble two times to two different people because of the slow responding. Please do improve this.

the services are good. the features are good. but the app performance is terrible. it's so slow, takes 10-30 second just to open a new page. the errors often occur too. Such a frustrating service. It says "Your session has expired" everytime I tried to login, whatever that means. Hi Jenius, please improve your app. it gets me irrated that I have to reloads lots of time. your function is brilliant but the app is super slow. don't think that it's about my connection, everytime I have to wait for lots of loading, I gave up and move to another mbanking I had on my phone and viola...things get done quick. The entire virtual banking concept merit the "genius" name. However, app stability is crucial! When it works? Great! But that is far from many. This is a banking app! Reliabililty and stability is key. There is too many issues on the server side and the client side.

I've been using Jenius for over a year. Preface and features are great! But, when it comes to flexicash there are things to improve. Jenius is getting heavier. Everytime i open, it takes long time to load. I keep having to login many time to get into the app. Everytime I press transaction detail to see, it keeps loading and not showing anything. This is annoying, I hope you'll fix it. Thanks

over years and years.. the connection is still like a snail... and annoying pop up first time you log in... hate it..! please fix it, you're not a shopping platform..just put in the push notification.

For a 'bank' that promotes the ease of software use, this application sure is bad. Everything is slow, from starting up to loading screens. The UI is fine, though it could be more simplistic in my opinion.

Useful but need serious improvements. Long load time. Moneytory category is not updated in real-time. Can't change language setting, always reverts automatically. Insufficient balance subject to fines. Seriously? It is that hard to check insufficient balance?

Sudah lebih baik tapi tetap lelet. Masuk ke Home dashboard saja butuh waktu hampir semenit. Lalu tidak bisa vayar QRIS menggunakan akun kartu yg lain. Sangat menyebalkan.

Saya pikir Jenius/BTPN perlu mempertimbangkan larangan penggunaan aplikasi Jenius memakai Android OS dari distribution yang cukup populer seperti Lineage OS. Banyak pengguna Android di Indonesia yang ingin memperpanjang masa pakai smartphonenya - mereka tidak lagi mendapat support berupa Android OS terbaru dari pabrikan. Terpaksa mereka bergantung pada third party Android OS distribution seperti Lineage OS. Dengan manajemen security yang baik, saya kira bisa didapatkan level security yang memadai dengan Lineage OS. Berarti juga mendukung orang-orang yang berfikir strategis untuk terus update technology dengan biaya yang efisien.

Jadi ada jeda beberapa detik utk input nomor PIN satu dengan yg lainnya. Itu menurut saya cukup mengganggu, karena kalo kita tidak sadar mengetik PIN didepan bbrp orang, karena ngetiknya harus lambat agar bisa terekam dgn sempurna, otomatis orang bisa notice atau tahu apa yg kita ketik. Kedua: Jaringan/koneksi ke server sering error.

Saya pikir Jenius/BTPN perlu mempertimbangkan larangan penggunaan aplikasi Jenius memakai Android OS dari distribution yang cukup populer seperti Lineage OS. Banyak pengguna Android di Indonesia yang ingin memperpanjang masa pakai smartphonenya - mereka tidak lagi mendapat support berupa Android OS terbaru dari pabrikan. Terpaksa mereka bergantung pada third party Android OS distribution seperti Lineage OS. Dengan manajemen security yang baik, saya kira bisa didapatkan level security yang memadai dengan Lineage OS. Berarti juga mendukung orang-orang yang berfikir strategis untuk terus update technology dengan biaya yang efisien.

The best banking app so far in Indonesia, easy to register n to open your BTPN account. No traffic jam, no queueing . No monthly charge, and some free transfer n ATM withdrawal based on total amount you have in your balance/30 days. First 4 free Debit cards that you can allocate each for your needs, e-card that can be used for PayPal activation n other e-commerce transactions. Well done BTPN for this breakthrough...

Do you know why you have to pay monthly "administration" fees to banks for essentially nothing? Because they are old, inefficient banks that maintains huge network of branches you rarely visit (if ever) anyway. Enter digital banking. With Jenius, you don't have to pay for nothing: zero minimum balance, zero transaction fees (up to certain limits), zero cash withdrawal fees, it's basically free money! To put cherry on top of the cake, the interest rate is also almost amongst the best in the country. I can definitely say that Jenius is the best digital banking here in Indonesia. I have other digital banking accounts at several other banks and, hands down, Jenius' app and overall user experience (including customer service) is the most stellar and consistent of them all. Go ahead and try explore Jenius! Promise you won't regret it.

First time using this application. Kinda regrets why didn't i install it earlier if only i knew the activation process are fast and easy. I can do the top up things to my accounts such as Netflix, Spotify, E-Wallets and stuff. No need to be worried because its simple and safe.

Sebelumnya membutuhkan waktu yang sangat lama bahkan bisa lebih dari 5 detik tapi sekarang sudah lebih cepat walaupun belum sebaik performanya BCA mobile dan myBCA. Padahal kalau dibatasi 2,5jt per tarik (sperti bank pada umumnya termasuk BCA) maka tinggal 4x @2,5jt. Kasian jd bikin antrian panjang di atm karna nariknya 9x. Bagus semua kecuali 1 yg merepotkan. Tarikan tunai di atm dibatasi 1,25jt per tarik. Kalau mau tarik 10jt sehari pecahan 100rb harus di pecah 8x @1,2jt + 1x @400rb (total 9x tarik). Padahal kalau dibatasi 2,5jt per tarik (sperti bank pada umumnya termasuk BCA) maka tinggal 4x @2,5jt. Kasian jd bikin antrian panjang di atm karna nariknya 9x. Mohon untuk update selanjutnya masukkan ini diperhatikan. Terima kasih.

Saya menggunakan aplikasi ini untuk menabung. Kadang ada waktu harus memindahkan dana untuk operasional jualan online. Sangat membantu mengalokasikan banyak hal. Semoga tidak crash, karena aplikasi pilihan saya utama setelah BCA appsnya üíñ
Untuk upload dokumen NPWP harus nya ada opsi upload dari hp langsung untuk mempermudah.

Untuk tampilan UI nya terlihat sangat trendy dan tidak terlihat kaku / monoton. Untuk experience nya lumayan mudah untuk orang awam yang baru pertama kali menggunakan aplikasi ini. Saran saja, untuk fitur shortcut pembayaran QRIS untuk tidak memasukkan PIN terlebih dahulu, dan ketika selesai melakukan scan pembayaran, kemudian menekan tombol kembali- halaman tetap berada di luar aplikasi (dalam posisi tidak login ke dashboard) Terima kasih :))

Overall okay, mudah transaksi terutama kalau dari BCA juga, bisa dipisah rekening untuk jajan dan untuk nabung jadi lebih bisa budgeting, tapi waktu loading di awal masuk aplikasi masih butuh waktu jadi kurang sat-set, misal kalau mau transaksi di kasir via QRIS jadi harus prepare dari sebelum antri spy pas bayar gak lama nunggu loading aja ü•≤
